overview:
one45 specializes in helping educational institutions solve their accreditation, curriculum management, assessment, scheduling and information management challenges.

one45â€²s provides a suite of software tools that help programs plan, provide, and track the learning experiences they deliver. Available modules include curriculum management, scheduling, evaluation, autoscheduling, encounter logging, grades tracking and reporting.
